metadata.titel_preek: A President Of Preaching (Funeral Sermon for Sandy Ray)

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The transition of the preacher Sandy Ray from his earthly ministry to his heavenly reward through the sovereign will of Christ.

tekstueel_bewijs: Father, I will that Sandy now be with me where I am.
I want him to see what I have prepared for him.
His Lord kept him away from the fiery arrows.

object.identificatie: The presence and glory of God (The 'Where I Am')
tekstueel_bewijs: that they may behold my glory
God wrought a miracle producing a Sandy Ray

ontvanger.identificatie: Sandy Ray (and by extension, the mourning congregation)
tekstueel_bewijs: He sent thousands forth from here... with a hope in their hearts.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies with the Receiver/Beneficiary of the story of Ray's life and death.

helper.identificatie: The Church (Cornerstone), Ray's wife, and the Holy Spirit (implied)
tekstueel_bewijs: the quiet strength she gave to him
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject/Sender; Christ is the active agent of the 'will'.
helper.rol_van_geest: Implicit in the 'golden voice' and 'fresh vision' provided to the people.

tegenstander.identificatie: Death, Sin (Lynch mobs/Oppression), and Physical Infirmity
tekstueel_bewijs: death has invaded the fields of our affection
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Death is treated as an invader that is ultimately bypassed by the 'standing up' crossing of the Subject.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The earthly ministry of Sandy Ray as a champion for the poor and a herald of the gospel.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: Sandy Ray
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Civil rights, the poor, and the edification of the congregation.
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The earthly work (Secondary) is framed as a 'scenario written by God' (Primary) which leads to the final 'crossing over'.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: God the Father → Eternal Glory → Sandy Ray
actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: Jesus Christ → The Soul of the Believer

voorbeelden_mens_subject: He made Cornerstone Church an affectionate name
We all have a sense of how much has been taken

voorbeelden: to see clearly through the film of grief
He passed through Jordan standing up
exhausted his power to thank you

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is driven by the Divine Will (Vouloir). The transition from life to death is not a human achievement but a result of Christ's desire.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the grief of loss (~S1) through the reality of death (S2) to the triumph of the 'standing up' crossing (~S2) into the Father's house (S1).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension of death is resolved by Christ's 'royal prerogative' to bring His own to Himself.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; death is described as an invasion and a chilling of the soul.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While the sermon eulogizes a man, it consistently identifies God as the author of the man's life and Christ's will as the cause of his salvation.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: His unvarying support... sterling record as a champion

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God wrought a miracle producing a Sandy Ray

indicatoren_genade.indicator: Christ as the Active Subject of Death
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Father, I will that Sandy now be with me

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Ray is presented as a 'prince' and 'herald', but his excellence is attributed to God's 'scenario'.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides a theocentric reading: Ray is the 'Object' of God's 'Subject' work.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Comfort and awe; the hearer is a witness to God's work in a human life.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Soteriology is monergistic; God provides the man, the message, and the 'crossing over'.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The earthly biography is seamlessly integrated into the divine narrative of Christ's high priestly prayer.
spanning_punten: The tension between Ray's 'gentle nature' and the 'fire and fury' of conflict.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The 'golden voice' and 'imaginative power' are treated as divine endowments.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is seen in the 'lynch mob' and 'carnage at Attica', requiring a 'herald of Calvary'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully maintains God/Christ as the primary Subject of the 'crossing over' narrative, avoiding the trap of pure human eulogy.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The hearer might feel like a 'peasant' compared to Ray's 'prince' status.
identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: The hearer as a fellow-beneficiary of the same 'will' of Christ.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize that the 'Father, I will' applies to all 'whom thou hast given me'.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain current balance; it is appropriate for a funeral.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Death is sufficiently personified and overcome.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (Christ's will) correctly precedes the Ethics (Ray's civil rights work).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in theocentric eulogy where the deceased is the 'Object' of God's 'Subject' action.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'music half spoken'; semiotics focuses on Christ as the 'Subject' of the verb 'to will'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would explain John 17; semiotics shows how Ray's life is 'mapped' onto the actantial roles of that text.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'engine' of the sermon is not Ray's virtue, but Christ's desire (Vouloir-faire).

appendices.notities: The sermon uses the 'Subject-switch' from Ray (earthly) to Christ (heavenly) at the moment of death.
